page.title: 02Little Kingshill School
page.content: Little Kingshill School is a combined school with a nursery attached.There are 315 children at the main school with eleven full-time teachers, a secretary and welfare assistants.The ages range from three in the nursery to twelve in the main school. The school now has a cash cafeteria at lunch time which the children enjoy.The younger ones have lunch at 12.00 and the older ones take it in turn later on; some children take sandwiches. The school has two adventure playgrounds,one for the first school, and one for the middle.There are also three playgrounds and a large field but the field can only be used for playtime when the weather has been dry. The children wear school uniform which is basically red and grey.
